adventureButtons.adventureOptionsInfo:
Adventure Options

Bring up the adventure options menu.
adventureButtons.endTurnInfo:
End Turn

End your turn and let the computer take its turn.
adventureButtons.gameOptionsInfo:
Game Options

Bring up the game options menu.
adventureButtons.kingdomOverviewInfo:
Kingdom Summary

View a summary of your kingdom.
adventureButtons.moveInfo:
Continue Movement

Continue the Hero's movement along his current path.
adventureButtons.nextHeroInfo:
Next Hero

Select the next Hero.

adventureScreen.confirmEndTurnMessage: One or more Heroes may still move, are you sure you want to end your turn?

adventureWindow.statusWindowInfo:
Status Window

This window provides information on the status of your hero or kingdom, and shows the date.  Left click here to cycle through these windows.
adventureWindow.worldMapInfo: World Map (Left click to move viewing area).

gameOptionsWindow.autoSaveInfo: Toggle 'Autosave' on/off. 'Autosave' saves your game automatically at the end of each turn to a special file, called 'AUTOSAVE'.
gameOptionsWindow.confirmInfo: Exit this menu without doing anything.
gameOptionsWindow.infoInfo: View information on the scenario you are currently playing.
gameOptionsWindow.loadGameConfirm: Are you sure you want to load a new game?  (Your current game will be lost)
gameOptionsWindow.movementSpeedInfo: Change the speed at which Heroes move on the main screen.
gameOptionsWindow.newGameConfirm: Are you sure you want to restart?  (Your current game will be lost)
gameOptionsWindow.quitConfirm: Are you sure you want to quit?  (Your current game will be lost)
gameOptionsWindow.showPathInfo: Toggle 'Show Path' on/off.  If 'Show Path' is on, your first click on a map location will show the path to get there, your second will start you moving. If this option is off, one click starts you moving immediately.
gameOptionsWindow.title: Game Options Window
gameOptionsWindow.viewEnemyMovementInfo: Toggle 'Show Enemy Moves' on/off. If on, all enemies moving within your visible area will be shown.  If off, no computer movement will be shown.  Note that this option is automatically set to off during network and modem play.

heroWindow.dismissConfirm: Are you sure you want to dismiss this Hero?

bad.description:
Bad Luck

Bad luck sometimes falls on your armies in combat, causing their attacks to only do half damage.


Current Luck Modifiers:
bad.title: Bad

good.description:
Good Luck

Good luck sometimes lets your armies get lucky attacks (double strength) in combat.


Current Luck Modifiers:
good.title: Good

neutral.description:
Neutral Luck

Neutral luck means your armies will never get lucky or unlucky attacks on the enemy.


Current Luck Modifiers:
neutral.title: Neutral

bad.description:
Bad Morale

Bad morale may cause your armies to freeze in combat.


Current Morale Modifiers:
bad.title: Bad

good.description:
Good Morale

Good morale may give your armies extra attacks in combat.


Current Morale Modifiers:
good.title: Good

neutral.description:
Neutral Morale

Neutral morale means your armies will never be blessed with extra attacks or freeze in combat.


Current Morale Modifiers:
neutral.title: Neutral

skillDescription.attack:
Attack Skill

Your attack skill is a bonus added to each creature's attack skill.
skillDescription.defense:
Defense Skill

Your defense skill is a bonus added to each creature's defense skill.
skillDescription.knowledge:
Knowledge

Your knowledge is the number of each spell you are able to memorize.
skillDescription.spellPower:
Spell Power

Your spell power determines the length or power of a spell.

heroWindow.title: Hero Window

troopDetailsWindow.dismissConfirm: Are you sure you want to dismiss this army?
troopDetailsWindow.title: Troop Details
